items.summary: Update the backend authorization logic so that users with the 'coordination' (coordinator) role are permitted to call the createReport (or equivalent) function, in addition to the roles that already have this permission.

Update the backend authorization logic so that users with the 'coordination' (coordinator) role are permitted to call the createActivity (or equivalent) function, in addition to the roles that already have this permission.

Update the frontend Sidebar navigation so that the coordinator role sees menu items for creating reports (e.g., link to ReportFormPage in create mode) and inserting activities (e.g., link or access to ActivityFormPage), if those links are currently hidden or disabled for coordinators.

Ensure that the ReportFormPage does not render as read-only for coordinator users when accessed in create mode, and that the ActivityFormPage create form is fully editable and submittable by coordinator users.
